title: RIOT POINTS
body:
Hello riot,

I want to know if you can give me 30 rp to get my Pool Party Graves skin. I am 30 short of rp. I currently have 1320. 

Riot after all I have spent on you, this is all i want in return. 

please - Jr lord 

{{item:3070}}

replies.body: send in some drawings or art of some sort. They wont just give you free rp

As an addition to this, Send it in to player support, and explain the situation, putting this on boards (and getting impatient in 10 minutes) isn't going to help, as we here can't do this

But know that this is a 1 time thing and won't happen again.
